name: Adva-Lines (pre-release demo)
description:
Adva-Lines is primarily a figure matching game but with much extended features and lots of other mechanics mixed-in. This game will force you to apply strong strategy plannig for every turn to win.

Main concept of this game is build on good old "Lines" game but pushed way beyond it's simplicity.

FEATURES:

Gameplay - basic concept is to build 5 figures in straight line. Different game modes alter this simple concept by adding many mechanics, tactics and features which will lead to whole new game expirience.

Perks - different abilities that will help you to complete your missions.

Game modes - apart from "Classic" mode this Demo version contains fully functional "Awakening" mode for singleplayer and "Kingdoms Brawl" mode for p-v-p Multiplayer (hotseat only)

Language: English, Russian

I was translating to English myself so i apologize for sometimes poor English.

Platform: Windows (x32, x64), Linux (x32, x64 untested), Mac (untested)

Players: 1-2 (hotseat only)

Controls: keyboard & mouse

This is a pre-release demo-version and it contains only a fraction of all content avaliable (that is already fully implemented). Also, it contains only a short range of difficulties for each game mode which also reduces the total amount of features avaliable.

Some specifics:
—  Single-player modes: 8 / 13
— PvP (2 player hotseat) modes: 3 / 3
—  Difficulty range: 0-15%
—  Campaign, chapters: 1 / 9
—  Story: intro only

Avaliable on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/878240/Advalines/
